name: Roadside Inn
description: A welcoming establishment along a major travel route provides lodging, food, and information for travelers. The constant flow of guests creates opportunities for news and gossip, while the isolated location can hide secret meetings or criminal activities.
atmosphere: Warm firelight spills from windows while the common room buzzes with travelers sharing news in multiple languages. The air carries roasting meat, fresh ale, and hospitality. Stables house weary horses as rooms upstairs provide shelter. The perfect stop for gathering information and resting between destinations.
